Total discretionary bursary fund £11,965
Where instances per student comes from

It is calculated using student’s home postcode from the autumn census and the index of multiple deprivation 2015.

ESFA is moving to a new methodology to calculate discretionary bursary fund. You received £16,357 in 2019 to 2020. During the transition, you will receive at least 75% of that amount (£12,268) and up to 125%.

£11,965 is less than the 75% lower limit. You will receive an adjusted amount of £12,268.
